projects.description:
5 Ways To Innovate is on a mission to help 1,000 corporates reinvent themselves to build the business of tomorrow.
I developed a tool that generates reports based on a simple survey to assess organisations current innovation score.
To implement this we used Squarespace to deploy the website, we used custom code to augment the possibilities and generate a report for users.
As soon as users complete the survey they receive an automated and custom designed email with a personalized link for their assessment. Used: Zapier, Surveymonkey, Javascript, Google Appscript, Google Sheets and D3js.

Ecotattooing.com is website to showcase the artists and suppliers who want to eliminate single-use plastics in exchange for compostable and biodegradable options in the world of tattooing.
I provided web design and development services as well as automation of certain processes that were manual before such as the map update after registration and a more complex form that changes based on users responses.

VEXTRE is an augmented reality project that visualizes the socio-economic situation of Extremadura, Spain related to each town and city. 

 The project also contains data visualization in a map.

A visual archive and interactive map that seeks to counteract the border tensions between Costa Rica and Nicaragua by making historical links visible through the memories of sexual dissidence in both countries. Full site: https://maricatransfrontera.com
Website for the livecoding collective tacacocodin made up of Randall Sáenz, Pablo Cianca, Johann Stolz and Jose Pablo Saenz.

projects.tituloProyecto: Cartografía del teatro de mujeres en Costa Rica
projects.description: This is an interactive map where you can see a list of theater productions directed by women in Costa Rica, from 2001 to 2022.

about.about: Welcome! Here technology, creativity, and collaboration  merge seamlessly to bring your digital dreams to life. I'm a dedicated solution provider, ready to craft innovative answers to your challenges. 'smosgasbord' is derived from the Swedish word 'smörgåsbord', which means 'a wide range of something; a variety.' In this context, this project is a digital smorgasbord, offering a diverse range of options and possibilities.
about.apart: I bring more to the table than lines of code or a list of technical skills. I bring a mindset that constantly seeks improvement, a spirit that thrives on collaboration, and a heart that beats for the betterment of others. My work isn't just about building websites; it's about crafting immersive experiences, weaving stories, and solving problems.
about.apart2: I possess a diverse skill set that includes proficiency in HTML/CSS/JavaScript, PHP, Handlebars, Astro, and WordPress. My expertise extends to XR, 3D, Data Visualization, Maps/Georeferencing, and Machine Learning Libraries. I'm well-versed in open-source technologies, and they are my passion. Additionally, my technical proficiencies cover various tools in the realms of Infrastructure, Cloud, Databases, and Virtualization.
about.why:
• Collaboration: I believe in working hand-in-hand with you, valuing your insights, and ensuring your vision shines through in every project.
  • Innovation: I'm not afraid to explore new frontiers and experiment with the latest technologies to find tailored solutions that truly stand out.
  • Adventurous Spirit: I approach challenges like exciting adventures, welcoming each one as an opportunity to learn and grow.
  • Wide Expertise: My skillset encompasses a broad range of technical proficiencies, enabling me to tackle diverse projects with confidence.
about.colab: Whether you're a social organization, an independent project, or a public institution, I'm here to provide you with excellent solutions. Let's embark on a journey together, one that leads to web experiences that leave a lasting impact.

services.description: Our web development services encompass designing UI/UX and creating custom websites tailored to your unique needs, ensuring a seamless online presence.
We specialize in creating interactive data visualizations that transform complex data sets into visually engaging and understandable insights.
We help streamline your organization's processes by digitizing and automating workflows leveraging AI, increasing efficiency and reducing manual efforts.
We offer hassle-free hosting migration services, ensuring a smooth transition of your website or application to a new hosting environment.
Our website administration services take care of the day-to-day management and maintenance of your website, allowing you to focus on your core business.
We optimize your website for search engines, enhancing its visibility and ranking to attract more organic traffic and improve online performance.
